price: دا چې له الله پرته بل څه مه لمانځئ، زه پر تاسو د دردوونكې ورځې له عذابه وېرېږم.
arabic: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: an lā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin alīmin
